title: SET_CAM_USE_SHALLOW_DOF_MODE
content:
0x16A96863A17552BB0x8306C256// SetCamUseShallowDofMode
void SET_CAM_USE_SHALLOW_DOF_MODE(Cam cam, BOOL toggle);Parameters:cam: The camera handletoggle: Boolean if the camera should use a shallow depth of field or notEnables or disables the usage of a shallow DOF. Needs to be set to true to use SET_CAM_NEAR_DOF, SET_CAM_FAR_DOF, etc. Doesn't need to be called every tick.Usage ExampleA usage example for this native can be found in the following native documentation: SET_CAM_DOF_STRENGTH.
codeBlocks:
// SetCamUseShallowDofMode
void SET_CAM_USE_SHALLOW_DOF_MODE(Cam cam, BOOL toggle);

-- Example usage for SET_CAM_USE_SHALLOW_DOF_MODE
SetCamUseShallowDofMode(0, false)
